message: This seems like a fair split to me considering the inflation rates. What do you think, Bob?
Your offer was heavily skewed in your favor, Alice. This is more reasonable considering the money will be worth less next round.
Bob, let's be real. You're losing value much faster than I am. This is my final offer - take it or leave it.
Alice, this is my last offer. It's becoming pointless for me to continue as the money is losing value so rapidly.
